item.title: Shani add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "If I had a view like this to look down on every day, I would have the energy and inspiration to conquer the world. The trouble is, when you most need such a view, no one gives it to you." -- Jennifer Egan

item.title: Shani add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "There are so many ways to go wrong. All we've got are metaphors, and they're never exactly right. You can never just Say. The. Thing." -- Jennifer Egan

item.title: Shani add a quote by Karen Thompson Walker
item.description: "I guess it never is what you worry over that comes to pass in the end. The real catastrophes are always differentâ€”unimagined, unprepared for, unknown." -- Karen Thompson Walker

item.title: Shani add a quote by Tayari Jones
item.description: "People say, that which doesn't kill you makes you stronger. But they are wrong. What doesn't kill you, doesn't kill you." -- Tayari Jones

item.title: Shani add a quote by Jennifer Close
item.description: "In college, twenty-nine had seemed impossibly old. By now, she'd thought, she'd be married and have kids. But as each year went by, she didn't feel much different than she had before. Time kept going by and she was just here, the same." -- Jennifer Close
